    "# Pull Data from the native-land.ca API\n",
    "Territory and Treaty overlays come from Native Land Digital\n",
    "native-land.ca"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "id": "3d55f488",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "response_API = requests.get(\"https://native-land.ca/api/index.php?maps=territories,treaties\")\n",
    "print(response_API.status_code)\n",
    "data = response_API.text\n",
    "parse_json = json.loads(data)"
   ]
